categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic trade paperbacks

nodes.text: Star Wars: The High Republic Vol. 3

Star Wars: The High Republic Vol. 3 is the forthcoming third trade paperback that collects issues of the canon comic book series Star Wars: The High Republic. It is scheduled to be published by Marvel Comics on April 5, 2022.

The history-making saga of the High Republic era continues! With the stakes higher than ever before and time running out quickly, the Jedi must mount a daring rescue! The Nihil base is square in their sights — and Sskeer insists on going with them, no matter his condition. But a floating fortress at the heart of No Space [sic] will not be an easy target — will the best plan be a full-on attack, or an undercover infiltration? The way of the Jedi allows only one answer. Let battle commence...and may the Force be with our heroes!
COLLECTING: Star Wars: The High Republic (2021) 11-15
